testcase.name: service 클래스는 controller에서만 접근해야 합니다()

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Architecture Violation [Priority: MEDIUM] - Rule 'classes that reside in a package '..service..' should only be accessed by any package ['..service..', '..api..']' was violated (1 times): Method <com.wnsgml972.strada.security.JwtAuthorizationFilter.getPrincipal(com.wnsgml972.strada.api.v1.account.service.AccessTokenRequest)> calls method <com.wnsgml972.strada.api.v1.account.service.AccessTokenRequest.getPhoneNumber()> in (JwtAuthorizationFilter.kt:68)
